channel.title: Project insanity why monsters dont respawn? i need help!
channel.description: Why the monsters on [PI] doesnt respawn? please help!!

item.title: Project insanity why monsters dont respawn? i need help!
item.dc:creator: @FtwCScape FtwCScape
item.description:
@FtwCScape wrote:

search in src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler

ForgetRespawnTime(int i)
Scroll down and you see(maybe)

Case (npcid): Case (npcid): ... return (respawntime);

and if u want them to respawn ALL npc at the same time use

default: return (Respawntime like 25);

i hope i helped? not pm me i will try to say it better!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

do you spawn them in the server (like when you are playing it, with a command) or do you spawn them in the autospawn file…because in your autospawn file in the cfg you have to add the npc id and coords
